Get 65% off any of the SmallWeb Shared Hosting plans for Black Friday 2019! Expires 2nd December.

[SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net) is a trading name of Cloud2Z Limited. Company 12272693.

We provide **DirectAdmin Shared & Reseller Hosting** in 7 locations.

* London, United Kingdom
* New York, United States
* Melbourne, Australia
* Luxembourg, Europe
* Los Angeles, United States
* Amsterdam, Netherlands
* Cluj-Napoca, Romania

<hr>

**SmallWeb Features:**

* 7 Locations Available
* Latest DirectAdmin
* NVMe/SSD Storage
* Free Let's Encrypt SSL
* CloudLinux (UK Only)
* AMD/Intel CPUs
* Latest PHP 7.X
* MariaDB SQL
* Daily Backups
* Free Migrations
* 99.9% Uptime
* 30 Day Guarantee
* Softaculous Apps
* ClamAV Scanner
* SpamAssassin
* & much much more!
